@Sandeshi Aberathna danata boru godak karagena yanwa hoda muna pennagena thawa tika kalayai owa. Ape meh minissu karpu wade nisa rate diyunuwa adapana una. Megapolice ministry ake champikage wada atharamaga nawathuna. Kiyaknm godak hoda wada maga athramaga nawathunada awa. Aya nm goda ganna amarui. Calton busuness aya oluwa ussala toyanwa danatama penawaneh. Danatama sudu van. Penawaneh.

@Sandeshi Aberathna meh tikata minissunwa rawattanwa vat adu kala kiyala. Ath hama baduwakama mila wadi karanwa petrol wadi karanwa gas wadi karanwa. Minissunta thawa tika kalayak yaddi danei owa kohomath. Mokada lokuma naya warike labana awrudde gewanna tiyanwa balamu ape gotabayage anduwa karana hati. Miriguwak passe giya ape minissunta therei. Athakota. Rate notibba prashnayak jathika arkshawa kiyanne aka na kiyala minissunge oluwata damme oya hiru tv and derana akai. Hodata kade giya channel 2k thama. Awa.
